aka: 巨世无双：美国尼米兹号
trans_title: 超大建筑狂想曲：尼米兹号航空母舰
巨世无双：美国尼米兹号
introduction: This film reveals how seven ingenious technological breakthroughs enabled engineers to build the biggest aircraft carrier in the world - the USS Nimitz, weighing more than 100,000 tons. From steam catapults and mirror landing aids to advanced nuclear-powered engines, well chart the historic inventions embodied by seven landmark aircraft carriers to see how aircraft carrier design continues to push the limits of size.
chinese_title: 超大建筑狂想曲：尼米兹号航空母舰
